title: Array Operations and Algebra Review
brief: This lesson reviews arrays, loops, algebra, and calculus. You'll practice manipulating arrays using loops and learn how to solve simple algebraic equations.

exercise.title: Array Length
instructions: Find the length of an array
Use the `length` property or a `for` loop

steps.label: Step 2: Find the length of the array
[object Object]
steps.code: for (var i = 0; i < arr.length; i++) { console.log(arr[i]); }
